typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{År} as short,
		Sektor as string,
		{Utslipp (tonn CO₂-ekvivalenter)} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'klimabarometer-kristiansand',
	folderPath: 'utslippdata',
	fileName: 'Oversikt.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> LeseCSV
LeseCSV derive(Dato = toDate(concat('01/01/', toString({År})), 'dd/MM/yyyy')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: 'KLD_data',
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	recreate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		{År},
		Sektor,
		{Utslipp (tonn CO₂-ekvivalenter)},
		Dato
	)) ~> sink1
